original_text: Now Jehoshaphat slept with his fathers, and was buried with his fathers in the city of David. And Jehoram his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 조상들과 함께 누우매 그의 조상들과 함께 다윗 성에 장사되고 그의 아들 여호람이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: Now Jehoshaphat slept with his fathers
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 여호사밧은 그 조상들과 함께 잠들었고

sentences.original_text: and was buried with his fathers
